scripts.serve: npm run generate-proto-files ../../../protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='generic' vue-cli-service serve
scripts.serve-acme: npm run generate-proto-files ../../../protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='acme' vue-cli-service serve
scripts.serve-bubba: npm run generate-proto-files ../../../protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='bubba' vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build: npm run generate-proto-files ./protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='generic' vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-acme: npm run generate-proto-files ./protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='acme' vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-bubba: npm run generate-proto-files ./protos && cross-env process.env.VUE_APP_BRAND='bubba' vue-cli-service build
